page.title: 20Health care in Manningham.
page.content: Manningham is becoming a{healthier} place to live to in.New houses,schools and clinics have opened. Doctors, nurses,midwives,health visitors care for all ages.Showers and baths are available.Meals and cleaners are arranged for old people living alone in specially designed bungalows.Â£90 per week pays for a room in a private nursing home.My family has a{social} {worker}for a friend.She comes every fortnight.Social workers help with family problems.Small children are taken to special nursery schools when mother is in hospital.They look after the family when mother visits the doctor.Mothers are glad of this help. Mothers can stay with their sick children in the Children's Hospital. Voluntary workers,Samaritans,help depressed people.
